entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
